author: benjaminchodroff
content:
2 days to go before we end CLWP GitHub new validator submissions on 2/28. We have received over 1600 validators so far. Cheers to all the amazing people in ETH R&D who helped us get this far - it's a bigger turnout than I could expect, and I sincerely hope it helps others either beat their attacker or realize they are compromised (feel free to check the validator indexes submitted). We have received no contested validators so far.

https://github.com/benjaminchodroff/ConsensusLayerWithdrawalProtection
